name: ormReload
description: Reinitializes ORM for the application.If you make any change to the persistent metadata of the CFCs, then you might want to reload the ORM.  Returns ORM session factory instance

examples.title: Reload ORM by calling ormReload onRequestStart
examples.description: Reloads the ORM of an application when ?ORMReload is in the URL.  This is recommeded ONLY for development and should be removed from production.
